Nightstrike:

"Then.." said the male "Take the lizard's boyfriend... I'll play with 
the lizard"


He changed to auroran jet mode and fired 25 times against Iron- Raptor


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireBlade::
> "I'll take whatever wants to fight me" said the 15 and half foot bot
> still waiting for his shots to hit..
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Nightstrike:
> >
> >
> > "Hey Fire blade!!!" said mockly Nightstrike "Do you rather play 
with
> > the reptile (IUron Raptor) or with his boyfriend?"
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > ::FireBlade::
> > > FireBLade heard NightStrikes invitation.
> > > 'About time I was invited to boogy down' he replied running over
> the
> > > hill he had stood behind for so long.  He took out his rifle and
> > > pulled out his montrous blade.  With his energy rifle he shot 10
> > shots
> > > at the mutated IR.  At the same time he pointed his sword at IR
> and
> > > sueezed the hilt with a proper amount of pressure and the sword
> > opened
> > > like a mouth and shot one of two missiles designed by FireBlade.
> The
> > > missile would explode once within 10 m of an enemy signature. 
All
> at
> > > once in hte explosion would be an EMP blast plus liquid fire at
> 1000
> > > plus degress C.
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:

> > > >
> > > > "Nightstrike to Megatron" said the male using his comm link "I

here
> > and
